mapper.select: SELECT strPdtCode FROM accomm_omk WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intAID = ${intAID} AND strUsageYn = 'Y' AND intOMKIdx = 7
SELECT MAX(SR.intSsgSeq) FROM STOCK_REAL SR WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN STOCK_OMK SO ON SR.intIdx = SO.intStockIdx WHERE SR.intAID = ${intAID} AND SO.intOMKIdx = 7

SELECT COUNT(SR.intIdx) FROM STOCK_REAL SR WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN STOCK_OMK SO ON SR.intIdx = SO.intStockIdx WHERE SR.intAID = ${intAID} AND SO.intOMKIdx = 7 AND SR.dateSales < dateadd(day,100,#{strDate}) AND SR.intSsgSeq IS NULL OR SR.intSsgSeq = ''
SELECT intAID FROM ACCOMM_OMK WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intOMKIdx = 7 AND strPdtCode = #{strPdtCode}
SELECT intRmIdx FROM STOCK_REAL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intIdx = ${intStockIdx}
--SELECT dateSales FROM STOCK_REAL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE intIdx = ${intStockIdx} select CONVERT(CHAR(10), good_date, 23) from andrew.dbo.goods with(nolock) where good_seq = ${intStockIdx}

SELECT SR.intIdx , SR.dateSales , RM.strRmtypeName , RM.strCpItemCode , RM.strCpRateCode , SR.intRmIdx , SR.moneyCost , SR.moneySales , SR.intStock , SR.intSsgSeq , SR.intGsshopSeq , SR.intElandSeq , SR.intElevenSeq , SRN.intStock AS intNextStock FROM STOCK_REAL SR CROSS JOIN ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM sys.objects -- 더미 테이블 ) n INNER JOIN RMTYPE RM WITH(NOLOCK) ON SR.intRmIdx = RM.intIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK_REAL SRN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SRN.intRmIdx = SR.intRmIdx AND SRN.dateSales = dateadd(day,1, SR.dateSales) WHERE SR.intAID = 101471 AND SR.intSsgSeq IS NULL
